entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
